objects.text:
• Active Noise Cancellation
• Premium Sound Quality
• 24-Hour Battery Life
• Comfortable Design

product_details.name: Bose QuietComfort Bluetooth Headphones, Wireless Headphones with Active Over Ear Noise Cancelling and Mic, Deep Bass, Up to 24 Hours of Playtime, White Smoke
product_details.description:
- Go beyond the beat and take control of the sound that puts you on top of the world with Bose QuietComfort Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones.
- Experience powerful high-fidelity audio with legendary noise cancellation in these wireless Bluetooth headphones that allow you to block everything out but the beat and control what you hear.
- These Bose wireless headphones feature new custom modes that give you the power to adjust noise cancellation based in the moment and the option to turn on Wind Block to tune out breezy environments.
- Or simply toggle your Bose over ear headphones between Quiet and Aware Modes for a quick change when the world calls for it.
- Adjustable EQ puts you in control of tuning your music and Spotify Tap starts your listening session at the push of a button on the side of the over the ear headphones.
- With up to 24 hours of battery life on a single charge, your Bluetooth headphones are ready for any adventure.
- Multi-point toggle lets you switch between multiple wireless connections on these around ear headphones without disconnecting and reconnecting each time.
- Plug in the optional audio cable with in-line microphone into these wireless headphones to make the headphones wired and use without a Bluetooth connection.
- The Bose Music app guides you through setup, lets you personalize settings, and keeps your headphones software up-to-date.
- Press play and take charge of your music with Bose QuietComfort Noise Cancelling Headphones.

banner_details:
The banner showcases a sleek, modern layout promoting a high-end wireless headphone product. The composition is divided into four color-blocked quadrants, creating a structured and clean visual framework. The large product image, positioned diagonally across the right side, draws immediate attention. Text elements include a bold, tech-inspired heading (`heading`), a refined subheading (`subheading`), a bullet-point list detailing product features (`description`), a confidently displayed price (`price`), and a prominent call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`). Decorative elements like subtle circular patterns and diagonally crossed lines enhance the contemporary feel without adding clutter. 

**Color Palette:**
- Light Gray (#F5F5F5)
- Soft Gray (#E8E8E8, #D6D6D6, #BEBEBE, #ABABAB)
- Medium Gray (#9E9E9E)
- Dark Gray (#333333)
- Accent Gray Circles (#808080)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a minimalist, sleek design centered around clean, soft neutral tones. The primary color is a matte, elegant off-white (#E8E6E3), giving the headphones a modern and premium aesthetic. Complementing this is a smooth, light gray (#D1D0CD) used subtly around the joints and padding areas, creating gentle contrast and depth. Reflective silver accents (#B5B5B5) add sophistication, particularly around the logo and headband joints, catching the light for visual interest. These tones blend seamlessly with each other, creating a monochromatic harmony while highlighting the brand’s understated luxury. Ideal advertisement palette: #E8E6E3, #D1D0CD, #B5B5B5, soft white (#F9F9F9), and charcoal gray (#4A4A4A).
